title: The Restrictions for Development in the vicinity of the protected monuments of state importance as prescribed under Ancient Monuments and Archaeological Sites and Remains Act, 1960 shall be observed
clause_text: The Restrictions for Development in the vicinity of the protected monuments of state importance as prescribed under Ancient Monuments and Archaeological Sites and Remains Act, 1960 shall be observed.
section: Restrictions in the Vicinity of Ancient Monuments

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
